news.title: Big Tech earnings: Why this 'common thread' will be 'key'
news.summary: Tesla (TSLA) and Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) are set to report earnings on Wednesday after markets close, while Intel (INTC) reports on Thursday after markets close. news.title: Railroad stocks, Microsoft, Equifax: Trending Tickers
news.summary: Railroad stocks, like Union Pacific (UNP), Norfolk Southern (NSC), and CSX Corp (CSX), are climbing on reports of railway mergers. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) CEO Warren Buffett has denied reports from Semafor and Reuters that BNSF Railway is in talks with Goldman Sachs to acquire a regional rival. Microsoft (MSFT) said Chinese state-sponsored hackers exploited a SharePoint flaw to breach global systems, though the company has since issued a patch. Equifax (EFX) stock is slipping after the company issued weaker-than-expected third quarter and full-year guidance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

news.title: Chip stocks slide, NXP weak outlook, Coinbase inks PNC deal
news.summary: Chipmakers Nvidia (NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Broadcom (AVGO) are trading lower following reports from the Wall Street Journal that SoftBank and OpenAI's $500 billion artificial intelligence (AI) data center project is off to a slow start. NXP Semiconductors (NXPI) stock slips after the company reported a drop in second quarter revenue and profit and warned of continued softness in third quarter. Coinbase (COIN) announced a new partnership with PNC Bank (PNC) to offer crypto services through its crypto-as-a-service platform. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
